snippet: Morocco had wanted the Cup delayed until June 2015 or early 2016, saying it was concerned that Ebola could be spread by visitors.
abstract: Soccer Roundup; Equatorial Guinea agrees to host the 2015 Africa Cup of Nations after Morocco refused, citing fear of the possible spread of Ebola; other soccer news noted.

byline.original: By JERÉ LONGMAN and RICHARD SANDOMIR

lead_paragraph: Morocco had wanted the Cup delayed until June 2015 or early 2016, saying it was concerned that Ebola could be spread by visitors.

headline.main: Equatorial Guinea Replaces Morocco as Africa Cup Host
headline.print_headline: Equatorial Guinea Replaces Morocco as Africa Cup Host
